text: The 2005-06 Austrian football championship was the 94th season of the top league in Austria.SK Austria Wienwon the title. The telecommunications company T-Mobile was the main sponsor of the league. ==Mode == The T-Mobile Bundesliga was contested by 10 teams. They met four times (two home and two away) throughout the entire season. ==Final table== Pl. Name M W D L P 1\. FK Austria Wien 36 19 10 7 67 2\. FC Red Bull Salzburg 36 20 3 13 63 3\. FC Pasching 36 16 10 10 58 4\. SV Ried 36 13 13 10 52 5\. SK Rapid Wien 36 13 10 13 49 6\. GAK 36 13 6 17 45 7\. SV Mattersburg 36 12 8 16 44 8\. SK Sturm Graz 36 10 12 14 42 9\. FC Wacker Tirol 36 10 12 14 42 10\.
